scripts.clean:screenshots: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(__dirname, 'screenshots'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Screenshots cleaned'); }"
scripts.clean:results: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(__dirname, 'test-results'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Test results cleaned'); }"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:screenshots && npm run clean:results
scripts.test: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --project=all
scripts.test:extension: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --project=extension
scripts.test:llm: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --project=llm-states
scripts.test:diffs: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --project=diff-interactions
scripts.test:long: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --project=long-running
scripts.test:headed: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --debug
scripts.test:grep: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --grep
scripts.test:file: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test
scripts.test:single: npm run clean && jlpm playwright test --grep
scripts.setup: echo 'Please edit tests/config.ts with your SAGE_JWT_TOKEN before running tests.'
